name: GGJ2022 - Vampire Game
description:
I wanted to make a tower defence game with two phases, where in the night you'd go raid the village for supplies and build your base, then during the day you'd defend yourself from the angry town people with the base you'd built. But turns out two days is not nearly enough time to get that done on my own, so I just packaged together as many of the features I could get done in time.

Controls:

* WASD / Arrows - Move

* Space - Jump

* U - Undo (in build mode)

* H - "Get Over Here" shout (in play mode)

You can spawn enemies by pressing the button in the bottom left corner. They will run towards you, but they cannot do any damage. You can take them out by building towers and getting them to run close to them.
